attributes.action: Ban Nigel Farage from politics and any other public office to protect our future
attributes.background: Nigel Farage, leader of the british UKIP Party has continuously lied and misled the public on several occasions. We rely on our politicians honesty and trustworthiness and it is now in the UK's and Europe's best interest that politics will be cleansed of such figures, such us Nigel Farage.
